name: Grandpa simulator
description:
The game was written completely from scratch in 48 hours. You play as a grandfather who loves to grumble, eat, and also his old things (old school). You need to support his needs as long as possible and enjoy his sluggishness, because he constantly breaks something and pretends that these are bugs in the game! Don't believe your grandfather, there are no bugs in the game!)

  • Left Mouse Click -> movement
  • Space -> interact
  • X -> throw :)
  • C -> talk with env
